definition: Taroko gorge national park in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], Taiwan/Taroko ethnic group Taiwan
highest/greatest/too (much)/very/extremely
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
pavilion (usu. two-storied)/cabinet (politics)/boudoir/woman's chamber/rack/shelf
Taroko, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

sentences.english: Truku refers to a mountain plateau or a place suitable for living.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣，意指山腰的平臺或可居住之地。

sentences.english: Visitors to Taroko Gorge always admire the beautiful scenery there.
sentences.chinese: 到太魯閣遊覽的旅客總是讚賞那裏優美的風景。

sentences.english: Among the popular scenic spots, Taroko gorge is the one of the best.
sentences.chinese: 在有名的景點裏，太魯閣峽谷是最棒的一個。

sentences.english: The Li family visited Taroko National Park last month.
sentences.chinese: 林家上個月去太魯閣國家公園玩。

sentences.english: Taroko Gorge is famous for its beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣是以它美麗的風景聞名。

sentences.english: We could stay in that five-star hotel in Taroko Gorge again.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以再去那間在太魯閣的五星級飯店。

sentences.english: Ancestral spirit worship forms the core of the Truku spiritual beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣人的信仰，是以祖靈爲中心的集體意識。

sentences.english: Taroko Tilting Electric Multiple Unit TEMU1000 was entering Keelung Station.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣號傾斜式列車正通過港西街平交道進入基隆站。

sentences.english: This is the entrance of Taroko Gorge National Park.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣國家公園嘅入口。

sentences.english: Yalong Bay's natural beauty attracts tourists.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣以自然美吸引遊客。

sentences.english: Taroko Gorge attracts a lot of tourists, especially in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 太魯閣引很多觀光客，尤其在夏天的時候。

definition: Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Taidong or Taitung city and county in Taiwan
Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
Jiayi or Chiayi city and county in west Taiwan
Wulai township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
scenic spot/place of interest (tourism)
Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Hengchun town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Suhua Highway, coastal road in northern Taiwan, built on the side of cliffs above the Pacific Ocean
roundabout (traffic island)/around an island (trip etc)
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
East Coast
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
